greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) is the n-th prime = -1 (mod n).
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: for p from n-1 by n do
if count = n then return p fi
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Apr 20 2004
